input.new_string:
# Get current task from current_task.json
    local current_task="unknown"
    if [ -f "$PROJECT_ROOT/.claude/state/current_task.json" ]; then
        if command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            current_task=$(jq -r '.task // "unknown"' "$PROJECT_ROOT/.claude/state/current_task.json")
        else
            current_task=$(grep -o '"task"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"[^"]*"' "$PROJECT_ROOT/.claude/state/current_task.json" | cut -d'"' -f4)
        fi
    fi
    current_task=${current_task:-"unknown"}

    echo "{\"progress\":{\"percentage\":$percentage,\"current_task\":\"$current_task\",\"token_count\":$token_count},\"system\":{\"status\":\"$status\",\"services_active\":$active_services,\"services_total\":$total_services},\"mode\":\"$mode\"}"

content.content:
format_task_name() {
    local task=$1
    # Truncate long task names
    if [ ${#task} -gt 25 ]; then
        echo "${task:0:22}..."
    else
        echo "$task"
    fi
}

# Function to get open tasks from DevFlow database
